answerText: Ghosts [or Gengangere][10] This Norwegian playwright of Ghosts wrote about Nora's escape from her marriage to Torvald in A Doll's House.
heading: ACF Regionals |2013 | Rice A + Columbia A | 10 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: A t the beginning of this play, Oswald comes home from Paris with congenital syphilis and a plan to marry his half-sister Regina. For 10 points each: [10] Name this play, in which Mrs. Alving funds an orphanage that Parson Manders burns down.
